snippet: More than two dozen homes have been destroyed or badly damaged and about 30 people have sought medical treatment as a result of a huge wildfire in southern Australia, officials said Monday.
abstract: Australian officials say large uncontrolled wildfire that has raged for days in southern part of country has badly damaged or destroyed more than two dozen homes and compelled thousands of residents to flee.
lead_paragraph: More than two dozen homes have been destroyed or badly damaged and about 30 people have sought medical treatment as a result of a huge wildfire in southern Australia, officials said Monday.
